typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['empsource','processed'],
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> sourceNewEmpFiles
source(output(
		EMPLOYEE_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		HIRE_DATE as string,
		JOB_ID as string,
		SALARY as string,
		COMMISSION_PCT as string,
		MANAGER_ID as string,
		DEPARTMENT_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceEmp
sourceEmp aggregate(maxid = max(EMPLOYEE_ID)) ~> getmaxid
getmaxid, sourceNewEmpFiles join(1===1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(employee_id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 derive(employee_id = toLong(maxid)+employee_id) ~> DerivedColumn1
